File Services (WAFS-products allow remote office users to access and share files globally at. LAN speeds over the WAN) with WAN optimization inside of a router, accelerating TCP-based. applications on a given network..     WAAS system consists of a set of devices called wide area application engines (WAEs) that work. together to optimize TCP traffic over your network.
